title: Font used in academic paper
content:
I am trying to identify the following font, used in an academic paper:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415144741im_/http:/typophile.com/files/strange_font_5418.png)

I ran it through MyFont, and I got the following result list (pardon the URL! Did not want to shorten in order to not give the impression I am posting suspicious links). However, I am not certain any of the options really match it. Could anyone help out? Thanks a lot in advance!

[http://www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/results?ch%5B0%5D=S&ch%5B1%5D=p&ch%5B...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415144741/http:/www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/results?ch%5B0%5D=S&ch%5B1%5D=p&ch%5B2%5D=O&ch%5B3%5D=n&ch%5B4%5D=d&ch%5B5%5D=y&ch%5B6%5D=&ch%5B7%5D=O&ch%5B8%5D=d&ch%5B9%5D=&ch%5B10%5D=&ch%5B11%5D=s&ch%5B12%5D=c&ch%5B13%5D=&ch%5B14%5D=&ch%5B15%5D=t&ch%5B16%5D=&ch%5B17%5D=&ch%5B18%5D=s&ch%5B19%5D=&ch%5B20%5D=&ch%5B21%5D=&ch%5B22%5D=p&ch%5B23%5D=d&ch%5B24%5D=a&ch%5B25%5D=t&ch%5B26%5D=e&ch%5B27%5D=O&ch%5B28%5D=n&ch%5B29%5D=d&ch%5B30%5D=&ch%5B31%5D=&ch%5B32%5D=a&ch%5B33%5D=g&ch%5B34%5D=n&ch%5B35%5D=O&ch%5B36%5D=s&ch%5B37%5D=&ch%5B38%5D=&ch%5B39%5D=s&ch%5B40%5D=a&ch%5B41%5D=n&ch%5B42%5D=d&ch%5B43%5D=m&ch%5B44%5D=a&ch%5B45%5D=n&ch%5B46%5D=a&ch%5B47%5D=g&ch%5B48%5D=e&ch%5B49%5D=m&ch%5B50%5D=e&ch%5B51%5D=n&ch%5B52%5D=t&wtfserver=wtf_b_41&id=00044be251e7d9390007151e00001514&glyphcount=53&imageid=0&x=94&y=35 "http://www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/results?ch%5B0%5D=S&ch%5B1%5D=p&ch%5B2%5D=O&ch%5B3%5D=n&ch%5B4%5D=d&ch%5B5%5D=y&ch%5B6%5D=&ch%5B7%5D=O&ch%5B8%5D=d&ch%5B9%5D=&ch%5B10%5D=&ch%5B11%5D=s&ch%5B12%5D=c&ch%5B13%5D=&ch%5B14%5D=&ch%5B15%5D=t&ch%5B16%5D=&ch%5B17%5D=&ch%5B18%5D=s&ch%5B19%5D=&ch%5B20%5D=&ch%5B21%5D=&ch%5B22%5D=p&ch%5B23%5D=d&ch%5B24%5D=a&ch%5B25%5D=t&ch%5B26%5D=e&ch%5B27%5D=O&ch%5B28%5D=n&ch%5B29%5D=d&ch%5B30%5D=&ch%5B31%5D=&ch%5B32%5D=a&ch%5B33%5D=g&ch%5B34%5D=n&ch%5B35%5D=O&ch%5B36%5D=s&ch%5B37%5D=&ch%5B38%5D=&ch%5B39%5D=s&ch%5B40%5D=a&ch%5B41%5D=n&ch%5B42%5D=d&ch%5B43%5D=m&ch%5B44%5D=a&ch%5B45%5D=n&ch%5B46%5D=a&ch%5B47%5D=g&ch%5B48%5D=e&ch%5B49%5D=m&ch%5B50%5D=e&ch%5B51%5D=n&ch%5B52%5D=t&wtfserver=wtf\_b\_41&id=00044be251e7d9390007151e00001514&glyphcount=53&imageid=0&x=94&y=35")
author: csvan

comments.content:
It should be noted that I tried running pdffonts on the PDF file itself, but it yielded next to no useful information.
